law.text:
As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires:
"Court" means a Circuit or District Court of this Commonwealth and includes any judge of these courts.
"Name" includes an identifying number.
law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 252, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 12, effective September 1, 1977.
